mapper.sql: id, userid, comuserid, impid, content, createtime, status, dealtime, dealuser, checkoption, contenttype, businessid, businesstype, username, cusername
mapper.select:
select
from imp_complaints
where status != 0
where status = 0
order by createtime desc
LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) from imp_complaints
where status != 0
where status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into imp_complaints (id, userid, comuserid, impid, content, createtime, status, dealtime, dealuser, checkoption, contenttype, businessid, businesstype, username, cusername ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{comuserid}, #{impid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dealuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkoption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessid}, #{businesstype}, #{username}, #{cusername} )

mapper.update:
update imp_complaints
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
impid = #{impid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
dealtime = #{dealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dealuser = #{dealuser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
checkoption = #{checkoption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contenttype = #{contenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
businessid = #{businessid},
businesstype = #{businesstype},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update imp_complaints set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, impid = #{impid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, dealtime = #{dealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dealuser = #{dealuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checkoption = #{checkoption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contenttype = #{contenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessid = #{businessid}, businesstype = #{businesstype} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
